org.grules.ast
[Groovy] Class FunctionsASTTransformation

java.lang.Object
  org.grules.ast.GrulesAstTransformation
      org.grules.ast.FunctionsASTTransformation

@GroovyASTTransformation(phase = CompilePhase.SEMANTIC_ANALYSIS)
class FunctionsASTTransformation
extends GrulesAstTransformation

Transformation for a functions class. The transformation makes all instance methods static.

Method Summary
void visit(org.codehaus.groovy.ast.ASTNode[] nodes, org.codehaus.groovy.control.SourceUnit source)

void visitModule(org.codehaus.groovy.ast.ModuleNode moduleNode, java.lang.Object node)

Visits each method and makes it static.
